title: Don't choose pets over children, Pope Francis says as birthrates drop
content:
1. Don't choose pets over children, Pope Francis says as birthrates drop  The Washington Post
  2. Opting for pets over children is selfish and 'takes away our humanity,' says Pope Francis  CNN
  3. Pope criticizes couples who adopt pets instead of children: 'a form of selfishness'  Fox News
  4. CNN tries to dunk on Pope Francis — worst 'gotcha' of 2022 so far  Washington Examiner
  5. I’d rather have cats than kids – what’s selfish about that?  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 子供よりペットを選ぶな、少子化の中、教皇フランシスコが発言
教皇方济各在出生率下降时说，不要选择宠物而不是孩子
教皇方濟各在出生率下降時說，不要選擇寵物而不是孩子
